Благодаря свойству ориентации полимеров,: Thanks to the orientation property of polymers, 5Dtech increases the bending and compressive strength. Your parts will be:
До х4 раз прочнее, чем 3D: Up to х4 times stronger than 3D
Благодаря объемной, а не послойной уклад: Owing to the volumetric, not layered, material deposition, 5Dtech technology reinforces the product structure. Use this advantage when printing with continuous fiber and create exceptionally strong quasi-isotropic products.
Благодаря многоосевой кинематике, технол: Thanks to the multi-axis kinematics, 5Dtech allows to avoid or significantly reduce the use of supports under the overhanging elements of the product, which increases production rates, reduces post-processing time and ensures material savings of up to 70%.
За счет оптимизации путей перемещения (б: Due to the optimization of travel paths (longer filling areas where the printer has time to reach the set speed), 5D printing speed is up to 2 times higher than in 3D printing.
В отличие от классической 3D печати, тех: In contrast to classic 3D printing, 5Dtech can print on any surface. Use special tooling for mass production of products or a pre-fabricated blank that will become part of the future product — now you can create composite parts with metal reinforcement.
Алгоритмы технологии 5Dtech обеспечивают: 5Dtech algorithms ensure automatic preparation of parts for multi-axis printing, in contrast to industrial solutions that require complex manual CAM preparation of the control program. Printing will be as easy as on a regular 3D printer.
Используйте привычные программы для CAD: Use your regular programs for CAD modelling. The STE Slicer software is compatible with STL, a common format for 3D printing, in contrast to industrial solutions that only work with proprietary CAD model formats in preparation for multi-axis printing.
5D принтер и программное обеспечение STE: 5D printer and STE Slicer software allow to work with several printing modes and combine them. Use Classic printing / Spiral printing / Trend line printing / Surface printing modes to perform any jobs.
Настольные 3D и 5D принтеры, повышающие: Desktop 3D and 5D printers that increase production efficiency and can solve tasks unsolvable for other 3D printers
Серия продвинутых 3D принтеров, предназн: Series of advanced 3D printers designed for training, production and development. Printing with two materials, closed printing chamber, and network control.
Серия инновационных 5D принтеров, для пе: A series of innovative 5D printers for printing strong products that open new production opportunities.
Серия 3D и 5D принтеров, обладающая возм: This series of 3D and 5D printers allows to print with continuous carbon fiber for special applications.

Двойной экструдер для печати с растворим: Dual extruder to print with soluble supports
Простой и надежный двойной экструдер спо: Simple and reliable dual extruder is capable of maintaining temperatures of up to 320°C ensuring high quality printing of any complexity — use printing with soluble supports or abrasive materials with a set of easily replaceable print blocks.
Принтеры Stereotech оснащены принтблокам: Stereotech printers are equipped with print blocks for fast and safe maintenance of the extruder. The standard set includes 4 print blocks — 2 for printing with model plastics, and 2 for printing with technical plastics with an all-metal thermal barrier
Встроенный компьютер с 64-битным четырёх: Built-in computer with 64-bit Quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 processor and 1GB RAM for fast, silent (up to 50 DBA) and stable operation
Лаконичный вид, корпус из 4 мм светопроп: Laconic appearance, white body frame made of 4 mm premium class light-transmitting acrylic — the printer will fit perfectly into any interior.
Шестицветная световая индикация и светод: Six-color indicator lights and RGBW LED-based illumination of the work area — for pleasant and comfortable work with the printer.
Закрытая камера и большая область печати: Closed chamber and large build volume
Закрытая камера с системой вентиляции об: A closed chamber with a ventilation system ensures user safety, stable operation and printing results. The build volume in the Stereotech printer product line reaches 400x310x300 mm
Удобное использование, сушка филамента и: Convenient use, drying of the filament and storage of large spools of up to 1 kg inside the body frame
Печать с катушек от 2,5 кг и более: Printing from spools of 2,5 kg and more
Используйте катушки с филаментом от 2,5: Use filament spools of 2,5 kg or more for large-scale printing — simply place the spools outside the printer and feed the thread through the service window.
Множество вариантов сетевого и автономно: Many options for network and offline control — via WiFi, Ethernet and USB
Прочная рама принтера из алюминиевого сп: Robust 6063 aluminum alloy printer frame, precise Hiwin MGN9 guide rails, Meanwell power adapter, powerful and reliable Sunon fans, Raspberry Pi 3 computer and other printer components from well-known brands — everything you need for reliable and long-lasting operation.
3D принтеры Stereotech оснащены системой: 3D printers Stereotech are equipped with STE App. Use it to manage 3D printers and the printing process in a single network via any device: a Stereotech 3D printer screen, an Android app for a smartphone or tablet, or a PC app. Embedded control system with service managers — for easy work with the printer.
Используйте возможности принтеров Stereo: Use the capabilities of Stereotech printers — a layer thickness of 10 microns will allow you to create truly detailed objects!
Печатающая головка с температурой нагрев: The printing head with a heating temperature of up to 320°C and the heated working platform with a heating temperature of up to 120°C enable printing even with structural polymers such as PC. Print blocks for modelling and engineering plastics allow to print with any filaments — from classic PLA to glass-filled and carbon-filled polyurethanes and polycarbonates.
